verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Sing glory and praise
To the Lamb that was slain sing glory
And praise again and again.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Sing glory and praise to the father above,
Sing glory and praise for His mercy and love.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Sing glory and praise to Jesus the Son.
Sing glory and praise for He's making us one.
